about_the_game:
Bloody Night Cult is a horror game inspired by the aesthetic of the 2000s, featuring low-poly VHS graphics. Dive into an experience where fear and mystery intertwine.

After the disappearance of your brother, who went to work in a quiet rural town, you find yourself in a desperate situation. The local authorities have failed to find any clues, and now it’s up to you to follow in his footsteps and uncover what truly happened.

Your journey takes you to Drizzlefield, an isolated town where, upon arrival, you realize something is terribly wrong. There’s no turning back now. Scarlett’s house, the woman who hired your brother, is your destination, but the road leading there is full of dangers, and something much darker may be lurking behind the disappearance.

  • Talk to the locals to advance your investigation.

  • Infiltrate the cult’s hideout if you dare…

  • Run, run, RUN! They’re after you!

  • Watch out for traps scattered throughout the secret facilities!

  • Find crucial items that could be key to your goal.

  • Unravel the TRUTH behind it all…

Trailer Music by Victor_Natas
